content: As an Oathbreaker Paladin, Azrael Blackwood has turned away from the tenets and beliefs of his former order and rejected the deity he once worshiped. Instead, he now serves himself and his own desires for power and control. He may still use his defaced holy symbol as a means of intimidation or to deceive others into thinking he still serves a higher power, but in reality, he has abandoned any true devotion to a god.
